10
11#include "modules/audio_processing/echo_detector/mean_variance_estimator.h"
12
13#include <math.h>
14
15#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
16
17namespace webrtc {
18namespace {
19
20// Parameter controlling the adaptation speed.
21constexpr float kAlpha = 0.001f;
22
23} // namespace
24
25void MeanVarianceEstimator::Update(float value) {
26 mean_ = (1.f - kAlpha) * mean_ + kAlpha * value;
27 variance_ =
28 (1.f - kAlpha) * variance_ + kAlpha * (value - mean_) * (value - mean_);
29 RTC_DCHECK(isfinite(mean_));
30 RTC_DCHECK(isfinite(variance_));
31}
32
33float MeanVarianceEstimator::std_deviation() const {
34 RTC_DCHECK_GE(variance_, 0.f);
35 return sqrtf(variance_);
36}
37
38float MeanVarianceEstimator::mean() const {
39 return mean_;
40}
41
42void MeanVarianceEstimator::Clear() {
43 mean_ = 0.f;
44 variance_ = 0.f;
45}
46
47} // namespace webrtc
48
